feed.title: Jordan Schiff - Blog
feed.subtitle: Software engineering insights, technology trends, and lessons learned building scalable applications.

entry.title: My Journey from University to Full Stack Engineer
entry.summary: Reflecting on the transition from computer science student to professional software engineer and lessons learned along the way.
entry.content: Starting my career journey at the University of Michigan, I never imagined the path that would lead me to where I am today. This post chronicles my experiences from student projects to professional software development...

entry.title: The Future of AI in Software Development
entry.summary: Exploring how artificial intelligence is transforming the way we write, test, and deploy software applications.
entry.content: As a Full Stack Engineer at Evertune AI, I've witnessed firsthand how AI is revolutionizing software development. From code generation to automated testing, AI tools are becoming indispensable for modern developers...

entry.title: Optimizing Database Performance in Spring Boot Applications
entry.summary: Practical strategies for improving database query performance and managing connections in enterprise Java applications.
entry.content: Working with large-scale applications at BNY taught me valuable lessons about database optimization. In this technical deep-dive, I share practical strategies for improving query performance, connection pooling, and data modeling in Spring Boot applications...

entry.title: Building Scalable Web Applications with React and Modern Architecture
entry.summary: Exploring best practices for creating maintainable and performant React applications in enterprise environments.
entry.content: In this post, I dive into the architectural decisions that make React applications scale effectively. From component composition patterns to state management strategies, we'll explore how to build applications that grow with your team and requirements...
